Does it fit over the tube and then you screw in set screws? Sorry I’m missing something here. How does the plug attach to the tube?

You would drill holes into the tube, put the tube nut into the tube, and then bolt thru the tube into the nut

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":9,"updated_at":"2022-01-10T03:12:25.499Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":336,"readers_count":335,"score":102.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":399401,"topic_slug":"what-are-tube-plugs","display_username":"rtomp","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":32451,"username":"EricRehder","name":"EricRehder","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/e/7ab992/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":20714,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/what-are-tube-plugs/399401/4","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2987940,"name":"Nick.kremer","username":"Nick.kremer","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nick.kremer/{size}/174932_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-10T03:21:19.598Z","cooked":"

The idea is to insert a tube plug into the end of tube, for the purpose of attaching that tube to another tube. Typically in FRC teams use gussets and rivets to accomplish this, however in some instances those gussets can get in the way (like in an elevator). Tube plugs allow you to make that joint in a different way.
